subject: Neighborhood Clean-Up
content: Join us for a neighborhood clean-up day on Saturday, May 9th, from 9 AM to 12 PM. Meet at the community center for gloves, trash bags, and refreshments!

subject: Noise Ordinance
content: Important notice: Due to noise complaints, please keep noise levels down after 10 PM on weekdays and midnight on weekends. Thank you for your cooperation.

subject: Community Newsletter
content: Our spring newsletter is now available! Pick up a copy at the office or download it from our website. Stay informed about community events and updates!

subject: Parking Lot Repaving
content: Attention tenants: The parking lot will be repaved starting Monday, May 4th, and will be closed until Friday, May 8th. Please make alternative parking arrangements during this time.

subject: Late Fee Reminder
content: Reminder: Late fees will be applied to unpaid rent after May 15th. Please ensure timely payment to avoid additional charges.

subject: Appliance Replacement
content: As part of our ongoing improvements, we will be replacing the refrigerator in unit 304 next week. You may experience brief interruptions in service. We apologize for any inconvenience.

subject: Office Hours Update
content: Important notice: Our office hours have changed. We are now open Monday-Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM. Please update your records accordingly.

subject: Community Potluck
content: Hey neighbors! Let's get together for a potluck dinner on Friday, May 2nd, at 6 PM in the community room. Bring your favorite dish to share and enjoy good company.

subject: Fire Safety Notice
content: Attention tenants: Please note that smoking is strictly prohibited in all common areas and balconies. Failure to comply may result in eviction. Thank you for your cooperation.

subject: Rent Reminder
content: Reminder: Rent is due on May 1st. Please ensure timely payment to avoid late fees. You can pay online or drop off a check at the office.

subject: Planned Water Outage
content: Dear tenants, there will be a planned water outage on Thursday, April 30th, from 9 AM to 3 PM. This is necessary for maintenance work. Please make arrangements for alternative water sources during this time.
